title: Are Emotions Overshadowing My Judgment?
description:
In this classic episode, Gerald is 27-years-old and thinking of moving in with his girlfriend, but is unsure if this is right to do. - Dr. Laura: "Don't rob yourself of a blessed memory by shacking up instead of marrying."

Are you shacking up? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment. 

Find me on social media at:
